title: Netflix's Ultimatum (Marry or Move On): Are Relationship Ultimatums the Ultimate Red Flag?
itunes:title: Netflix's Ultimatum (Marry or Move On): Are Relationship Ultimatums the Ultimate Red Flag?
itunes:subtitle: Do we think ultimatums are toxic and manipulative or simply setting a boundary?
description:
If you've watched the most recent Netflix reality TV toxic relationship disaster known as Ultimatum: Marry or Move On, then this week's episode is for you. Not only are we psychoanalyzing the shit out of Colby, Ray, Madlyn, Nate and other contestants from the show, but the basic & the brain deep dive into what the concept of an ultimatum is, dissect whether it's a toxic and manipulative habit or a potential way to setting a healthy boundary within a relationship, and discuss whether or not ultimatums can actually be a useful tactic within a relationship to move forward together.


Join us this week as we chat red flags, continue to bitch about influencer culture (Revolve Fest...we're looking at you), and discuss the gospel of "He's Just Not That Into You"



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
